Update from the NCJSC To-Ken Taikai - www.ncjsc.org -  they have sold out all tables. They have sold out the room block - over 400 room nights! - the hotel has extended our room block, so if you want the show rate now is the time to make your hotel reservation.
Confirmations for Shinsa registrations have gone out already, so if you are on the fence about coming now is the time to register your swords and make your hotel reservation.

www.toryu-mon.com

Looking forward to seeing you all there,
-t
Thomas C Helm
www.toryu-mon.com
2013 NTHK West Coast Shinsa
